jamaican.text: The soldiers’ blood, the general’s reputation.
Beauty widout grace like rose widout smell.
Befo' darg go widout supper, him nyam cockroach.
Before you married keep you' two eye open; after you married, shut one.
Beggar beg from beggar him nebber get rich
Behind the dog it is "dog," in front of it, it's "mister dog."
Blood follow vein.
Boastin' man brudder a de liar.
Bucket wid hole a battam have no business a riverside.
Bushes have ears, walls have eyes.
Cap no fit you, you no tek i' up.
If "How are you?" cost a cent, few would hear it.
If a flea had money, it would buy its own dog.
If chickens were judges, cockroaches would be sentenced.
If stars were loaves, many people would sleep out.
If you cannot dance, you will say the drumming is poor.
If you crape gourdy, you fin' worm-hole.
If you don't take it, you don't have it.
If you follow a fool, you're a fool yourself.
If you go a tump-a-foot dance, you must dance tump-a-foot.
If you saw what the river carried, you would never drink the water.
Eat fam'bly bittle but no cut fam'bly 'tory.
Eat with the devil but give him a long spoon.
Ebery day a fishing-day, but no ebery day fe ketch fish.
Ebery day debil help tief, one day god help watchman.
Empty bag cyaa stan' up.
Empty barrel mek de mos' noise.
Empty pots will never boil over.
Enough with the irrelevant details.
Every cave-hole have him own duppy.
Every dog got dem diay, Every puss dem 4 O' clock.
Every dog knows his dinnertime.
Every man honest till de day him ketch.
Every man know whe' him own house de leak.
Every mickle mek a mockle.
Feel like Gumbeh drum widout a goat-skin.
Fill your basket one item at a time.
Finger stink you can't cut it trow it wey.
Fish-bone no lodge in a pickney troat alone.
Frog never gargle him troat till him tas'e fresh water.
Fry de bigh fish fust, te lilly one after.
Manners tek yu thru' di worl'.
Marriage has teeth and it bites hard.
Marriage has teeth, and him bite very hot.
Me no call you no come
Meat that the cat brings in never gets to your plate.
Mi come here fi drink milk, mi noh come here fi count cow.
Monkey mus' know weh 'im gwine put 'im tail, before 'im order trousiz.
Nanny-goat neber �cratch him back till him see wall.
Nebber mek you sail too big fe you ship.
Neva si, come si.
Lickle bit a ram goat have beard an' big dull noh have nun.
Lilly axe can cut down big tree.
Lilly billy-goat hab beard by big bull hab none.
Make a friend when you don't need one.
Man dat carry straw no fe fool wid fire.
Man hab cow him look fi milk.
Man no hab gourdy, him satisfy wid bottle.
Man noh dead, noh call 'im duppy.
Man noh done cross riva, noh fi cuss alligator long mout long.
Manners mek di man.
Cuss-cuss noh bore hole a mi skin.
Cyaa tan fur, t'row saal inna pat
Darg-flea tell him pickeny him mustn't say him dead till him ketch pon finger nail.
Daylight sho t'rough lilly keyhole.
De bes a field mus' hab weed.
De higher monkey climb de more him expose.
De tune you playing no de one I dancing.
Dem give yu basket fi carry water.
Di daakes' part a di night, a when diay soon light.
Duppy knwo who fi frighten.
Prayer from de mout' alone is no prayer.
Prayer only from the mouth is no prayer.
Pretty rose got macca jook.
Pudden cyaa bake widout fiah.
Puss an' Dog noh have di same luck.
Rat belly full, potato have skin.
Rockstone a riva battam noh know' sun hot.
Sarry fi maaga dog, maaga dog tu'n 'roun' bit yu.
Save money and money will save you.
Scratch an old woman's back and she will let you taste her pepper pot.
When herring mauger him bone show.
When Jackass back strong, dem overload 'im hamper.
When Jackass smell corn, 'im gallop.
When kitchen dresser tumble dung, maaga dog laugh.
When rat like fi romp 'roun' puss jaw, one diay 'im gwine en up inna puss craw.
When the affected lady is doing well she eats her peas with a pin.
When visitors come a wi fireside, wi mek wi pot smell nice.
When water trow weh i' cyaa pick up.
When you buy beef, you buy bones; when you buy land, you buy rocks.
When you go to a donkey's house, don't talk about ears.
New broom sweep clean, but de ole broom know de corner.
No all foot in a boot a good foot.
No call alligator long mouth till you pass him.
No ebery chain you hear a fe rollin'calf.
No hang you clothes all pon one nail.
No Ketchie, ho habie.
No mek one donkey choke you.
No put youself in a barrel when match box can hol you.
Noh care how boar hog try fi hide under sheep wool, 'im grunt always betray 'im.
Noh cup noh brok, noh coffee noh trow weh.
Chicken deh merry, Hawk deh near.
Chip neber fly far from de block.
Clothes cover up character.
Cockroach neber so drunk him walk a fowl yard.
Cockroach nuh business inna fowl fight.
Cow non dead him wi shak him tail
Cows do not indulge in horseplay.
Cows have no business in horseplay.
Crab'n choke puppy.
Cuss-cuss never bore hole a man' kin.
The hungry belly and the full belly do not walk the same road.
The hungry fowl wakes early.
The nearer the bone, the sweeter the meat.
The soldiers' blood, the general's reputation.
The spider and the fly can't make a deal.
The umbrella was made for rainy days, the white man uses it for the sun.
Them short fe singer when dem put peacock in a choir.
Those who can't dance say the music is no good.
Those who cant dance blame it on the music.
Tideh fi mi, tomorrow fi yu.
Godamighty mek man straight, a rum mek him can't 'tan' up.
Going to bed without dinner is better than waking up in debt.
Haad iyaz pick'ni bu'n a sun hot.
Han' go, paki come.
Han'some face and good luck don' trabble de same pass.
hog run fe him life, darg run fe him character.
Hog say, di fus water 'im cetch 'im walla.
Hog say, di fus water im cetch, I'm walla.
Howdy an 'tenk yu, noh brok noh square.
I cow dod did know how him troat hole ton him wouldn't chance pear seed.
Tired feet always say that the path is long.
Today can't catch tomorrow.
Too much callaloo, mek peppa-pot stew bitter.
Too much hurry, and get there tomorrow; take time, get there today.
Virtue never goes far without the company of idleness.
Walk better dan sidong.
Want all, loose all.
Want i' want i', cyaa get i' an' get i' get i', no want i'.
We run t'ings, t'ings noh run we.
Wha costs nutting gib good weight.
A good conscience is better than a big wage.
A greedy mek fly follow coffin go a hole.
A lawyer looks at you with one eye, but he looks at your pocket with two.
A little axe can cut down a big tree.
A little pepper burns a big man's mouth.
A man with trousers that are too short should wear long suspenders.
A new broom sweeps clean, but an old broom knows every corner.
A noh every mango got maggige.
A noh siame diay leaf drop a river bottom it rotten.
A pound a fret can't pay an ounce a debt.
Ackee lub fat, ocra lub salt
All kind of fish eat man, only shark get blame.
Alligator lay egg but him no fowl.
Alligator lay egg, but 'im noh fowl.
Alligator shouldn' call hog long mout.
An old debt is better than an old grudge.
Bad luck wos dan Obeah.
Barking saves biting.
Beautiful 'ooman, beautiful trouble.
Beautiful woman, beautiful trouble.
You can't have two faces under one hat.
You can't prevent a bird from flying over your head, but you can prevent him from making a nest in your head.
You can't take the milk back from the coffee.
You cannot tie up a dog with a chain of sausages.
You nebber see kicking' cow widout kickin'calf.
You nebber see pop-gun kill alligator.
You shake a man's hand, you don't shake his heart.
You shake man's hand, you no shake his heart.
You will often see a high collar above an empty stomach.
If you want half a bread, beg smaddy buy it, but if yu want a wan, buy it yuself.
If you want to know who your friends are, lie by the roadside and pretend to be drunk.
If you yearry debil a come, clear de way.
If yu cyaa tek di heat, get out a di kitchen.
If yu de shit, an' si certain people/person a come; sidong inna it.
It' better fi lose yu timedan yu character.
Keep both eyes open before you are married and afterwards close only one.
Keep your secret in your own gourdy.
Keep your shop and your shop will keep you.
Learn fe dance at home before you go abroad.
When you point your finger at someone, look where the other fingers point.
When your own funeral is approaching, you don't pick and choose your grave diggers.
When yu go a fireside an' see food, eat half an' lef' half.
When yu go a Jackass yard, yu noh fi chat 'bout big iyaz.
Wherever there are bones, there are dogs.
Who ha' fingernail no ha' itch, and who ha' itch no ha' fingernail.
Words die and men keep on living.
Words in mouth, no load upon head.
You can say anything to a man with a full stomach.
You can stop a bird from flying over you, but you can't stop it building a nest.
Sensa fowl no wan fedder, but him want carn.
Sleep has no master.
Sleepy turtles never catch up with the sunrise.
Some people clean a tap an' dutty underneath.
Spit in the sky, it falls in your eye.
Ston a riva battan nuh know sun hat
T'ief no love fi si t'ief carry long bag.
That which you do not know is older than you.
The black man steals just half of very little, but the white man steals the whole sugar plantation.
The higher the monkey climbs the more him expose.
Noh put yu cap wh� yu caang reach it.
Not everything that is good to eat is good to talk about.
Not everything you hear is good for conversation.
One finger can't ketch louse
One, one cocoa full basket.
One-eye man a king a blind country.
Pay the doctor, praise the Lord.
Peppa bu'n hot, but ih good fi curry.
Plantain ripe, can't green again.
Play wid puppy, Puppy lick yu mouth.
Wha sweet nanny-goat a go run him belly.
Wha' noh poison, fatten.
What darg see him bark all night, ramgoat see it no trouble him.
What de good a education if him got no sense?
When a dog has money, he buys cheese.
When ashes cole darg sleep in dey.
When bull ole him feed a fence side.
When cockroach get in a trouble, him well glad fe fun go hide a fowl-house.
When crab walk too much him los' him claw.
When crab walk too much, 'im lose 'im claw.
If you go to a donkey’s house, don’t talk about ears.
Poun ah fret cyaan pay ounce ah det.
What good a educayshun if him got noh sens.
Howdy an tenk yu noh broke noh skware.
All kine ah fish eat man, but only shark get de blame.
Yu shek man han, yu noh shek im heart.
If you go to a donkey’s house, don’t talk about ears.
When your own funeral is approaching, you don’t pick and choose your grave diggers.
The black man steals just half of very little, but the white man steals the whole sugar plantation.
Those who cant dance blame it on the music.
Not everything you hear is good for conversation.
If "How are you?" cost a cent, few would hear it.
Pay the doctor, praise the Lord.
Clothes cover up character.
A man with trousers that are too short should wear long suspenders.
Tired feet always say that the path is long.
A little axe can cut down a big tree.
The umbrella was made for rainy days, the white man uses it for the sun.
When you go to a donkey’s house, don’t talk about ears.
You cannot tie up a dog with a chain of sausages.
Virtue never goes far without the company of idleness.
Words die and men keep on living.
Words in mouth, no load upon head.
A lawyer looks at you with one eye, but he looks at your pocket with two.
If chickens were judges, cockroaches would be sentenced.
Prayer only from the mouth is no prayer.
Eat with the devil but give him a long spoon.
A little pepper burns a big man’s mouth.
Those who can’t dance say the music is no good.
The umbrella was made for rainy days; the white man uses it for the sun.
Too much hurry, and get there tomorrow; take time, get there today.
Today can’t catch tomorrow.
Save money and money will save you.
When you buy beef, you buy bones; when you buy land, you buy rocks.
When a dog has money, he buys cheese.
If a flea had money, it would buy its own dog.
The hungry fowl wakes early.
Bushes have ears, walls have eyes.
Sleepy turtles never catch up with the sunrise.
If you want to know who your friends are, lie by the roadside and pretend to be drunk.
Beautiful woman, beautiful trouble.
Marriage has teeth and it bites hard.
You can stop a bird from flying over you, but you can’t stop it building a nest.
Keep both eyes open before you are married and afterwards close only one.
When you point your finger at someone, look where the other fingers point.
Empty pots will never boil over.
Not everything that is good to eat is good to talk about.
Every dog knows his dinnertime.
Going to bed without dinner is better than waking up in debt.
Scratch an old woman’s back and she will let you taste her pepper pot.
The nearer the bone, the sweeter the meat.
You can’t take the milk back from the coffee.
Beautiful woman, beautiful trouble.
When your own funeral is approaching, you don’t pick and choose your grave diggers.
You can say anything to a man with a full stomach.
Behind the dog it is "dog," in front of it, it’s "mister dog."
Sleep has no master.
You will often see a high collar above an empty stomach.
I came here to drink milk; I didn’t come to count cows.
Fire is at a mouse’s tail, he thinks it’s cool breeze.
A cock’s mouth causes its death
Every hoe has their thicket of bushes.
When the affected lady is doing well she eats her peas with a pin.
If you follow a fool, you’re a fool yourself.
Behind the dog it is "dog," in front of it, it’s "mister dog".
The pig asked his Mother why her mouth was so long; Mother said, ‘Don’t worry child, you are growing, you will see’.
One by one cocoa can full a basket
Cows do not indulge in horseplay.
The tune you are playing is not the one I am dancing to.
Keep your secret in your own gourd.
If speech is worth a shilling, silence is worth a pound
Trouble doesn’t give signs like the rain.
Chicken is merry, a hawk is nearby.
A ghost knows whom to frighten
Learn to crawl before you walk
The crab says he does not trust any shadow after dark
No call alligator long mouth till you pass him.
A good conscience is better than a big wage.
What tastes good to a goat will later upset his stomach.
Those who really want something cannot get it, those who are always getting things do not want it.
See and blind, hear and deaf.
You do not know how the parson got his gown
Because the parrot makes a noise, they say that he is the only one that ate the banana
The spider and the fly can’t make a deal.
Give a man my horse; he wants a saddle as well.
I didn’t come here to hear that a horse is dead and a cow is fat.
Every little makes something.
What the goat does, the kid follows.
Time is longer than a rope.
Meat that the cat brings in never gets to your plate.
If you see everybody running take your time.
Barking saves biting.
An old debt is better than an old grudge.
I was not born when my mother was gone to the market.
Make a friend when you don’t need one.
That which you do not know is older than you.
You shake a man’s hand, you don’t shake his heart.
To see me and come live with me are two different things.
When a cocoa is ripe it will burst
I threw my corn but I didn’t call any fowl.
Those who can’t dance blame it on the music.
If you don’t take it, you don’t have it.
Before a dog goes without his supper, he will eat cockroaches
You can’t have two faces under one hat.
I am old but I am not cold.
If you go to a donkey’s house, don’t talk about ears.
